flawed_nl_solution:
Deshaun read 91200 pages because 60 x 320 = <<60*320=91200>>91200
The person closest to him read 68400 pages because 91200 x 0.75 = <<68400=68400>>68400
They read 855 pages a day because 68400 / 80 = <<68400/80=855>>855
#### 855

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19200, not 91200. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
